Name: Smokestack Lightning
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Torabhaig Peated Single Malt Whisky
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: Margarita -like with a wisp of peaty smoke.
History: Created in 2009 by yours truly for The Cocktail Hour at Tales of the Cocktail that year.
Nutrition: One serving of Smokestack Lightning contains 180 calories
